cf.lukasheinzl.mc.api

Class InventoryRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • cf.lukasheinzl.mc.api.InventoryRegistry

  • public class InventoryRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to manage APIInventories.
    Author:
    Lukas Heinzl

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register(APIInventory i)
        Register the APIInventory. It can be access by its name (see getName())
        Parameters:
        i - The APIInventory to register

      • register

        public static void register(java.lang.String name,
                            APIInventory i)
        Registers the APIInventory with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The internal name of this inventory
        i - The APIInventory to register

      • remove

        public static void remove(APIInventory i)
        Removes the APIInventory from the registry.
        Parameters:
        i - The APIInventory to remove
        See Also:
        remove(String)

      • remove

        public static void remove(java.lang.String name)
        Removes the APIInventory from the registry.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the APIInventory to remove

      • get

        public static APIInventory get(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the APIInventory, if registered, with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the APIInventory to search for
        Returns:
        The APIInventory, if registered or null
